_meanings:
{@--3@} The
desire of plants at budding time
(as, for instance, of the Aśoka to
be kicked by young ladies, of the
Bakula to with sprinkled by 
mouthfuls of liquor &c.); {#mahIruhA#} 
{#dohadasekaSakterAkAlikaM korakamudgiraMti#} <ls>N. 3. 21</ls>;
<ls>R. 8. 62</ls>; <ls>Me. 78</ls>; see {#aSoka#}.

{2} the period of passing from
one stage of life to another.
